title: Angelina Jolie Sells Stake in French Wine Estate, Capping Fight With Brad Pitt Over Miraval
sub_head: The sale comes after the divorced couple couldn’t agree on a buyout of Ms. Jolie’s stake
body:
Actress Angelina Jolie sold her stake in a French château and winery business to a third party, capping a yearslong fight in which she and her ex-husband Brad Pitt battled over the future of the assets.
The couple bought the Château Miraval estate in the South of France in 2011, and they were married there in 2014. While the two have since divorced, they both retained equal ownership of the estate and the wine brand Miraval, known for its rosé.
